column1: Key ICT indicators for developed and developing countries, the world and special regions (totals and penetration rates)
Population covered by a mobile-cellular network
Population covered by at least a 3G mobile network
Population covered by at least an LTE/WiMAX mobile network
Households with Internet access at home
Regions in this table are based on the ITU regions, see: http://www.itu.int/en/ITU-D/Statistics/Pages/definitions/regions.aspx
